options: To iterate over the elements of an array
To create a new array with the results of calling a provided function on every element in the array
To filter the elements of an array based on a condition
To sort the elements of an array

To add elements to the beginning of an array

To apply a function to each element of an array and reduce it to a single value
To remove the first element from an array
To convert a string to an array of characters
